TECHNICAL_EXCEPTION: Oops! Something went wrong, please try again.

INVALID_PASSWORD: Sorry, it seems you enter incorrect password.

MISSING_CURRENT_PASSWORD: Sorry, you are missing current password.

PHONE_NUMBER_ALREADY_USING: Sorry, it seems someone has been using this phone number.
